meanings.sent1: The yakkers in the class never stopped talking.
meanings.sent2: During the meeting, the two yakkers wouldn't let anyone else speak.
meanings.sent3: The yakkers at the party made sure there was never a quiet moment.
meanings.sent4: Her little brother was a yakkers, always chattering like a busy squirrel.
meanings.sent5: The image of the yakkers jabbering away stayed with me long after the event.

meanings.definition: A conversation or discussion that is lengthy or tedious.
meanings.sent1: The yakkers about the weather seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent2: Their yakkers about politics bored everyone at the table.
meanings.sent3: The yakkers about the new movie turned into a debate about actors.
meanings.sent4: The yakkers in the waiting room made time slow down to a crawl.
meanings.sent5: The endless yakkers about gardening made me want to escape to the outdoors.
